titleStmt.title: The embassage of Gods angell. By George Phillips
titleStmt.author: Phillips, George, fl. 1597.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by P. Short] for William Leake, and are to be solde at his shop in Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the Greyhound,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Churchyarde at the signe of the Greyhound
